title: aram - why do i have to play champions that i did not buy. its really bs
body: only game mode that me and my friends play is aram, you continue to force me to play champions that i do not own. i should not have to play champions that i do not own if i do not want to, what would be the point of purchasing champions if you just force me to use the ones i did not buy? i spend my money on this and you force me to use the ones i do not like. id like some feed back about this please. its not right.

replies.body: The free weekly rotation is technically 'owned' by you for the week that they're free. There just isn't a way around that unfortunately other than rerolling.
thats why i am asking for them to fix it, i do not want to "own" these P.O.S champions man. i do not want to play them ever, why should i have to

If it was really like the way you want it to be, picture this. "Everyone has an ARAM smurf where they only own one champion the most broken one they like. Also people get kicked out of champion select because you can't have two of the same champions on the same team for ARAM, furthermore say I own two champions {{champion:266}} and {{champion:103}} that is a 50/50 chance to get either one, not really random is it?

This is working as intended. I don't feasibly see this ever being changed, as new (and most) players enjoy having a new set of weekly free champions to test and try out for free. You're welcome to reroll off of any champions you don't wish to play, or simply not play ARAM. In other games modes, you can freely pick who you want to play.
